mapper.insert: insert into core_data.user_role (id, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, role_id, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update core_data.user_role set created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, role_id, user_id from core_data.user_role where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, role_id, user_id from core_data.user_role
